website_summaries.verdict: Every kid is going to love a dabbing Uncle Sam.
pros: Comes in 5 festive colors with dabbing Uncle Sam on the front
Both boys and girls will like this shirt
Also comes in men's and women's sizes
cons: This shirt is not inexpensive, but you'll be getting a popular choice

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 10 boys/youth. It fits my 8 year old (he's very tall for his age) perfectly. Good quality shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Parks

customer_reviews.title: Cute, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephews 12 year old nephews trip to Washington DC he really liked it !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shirt. What a cute idea. Great design. And great quality for price. Size was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: "Totes adorbs"
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandsom for the 4th of July. He loved it and was showing it to everyone. Nice, roomy, comfy fit. I totally recommend this garment.
customer_reviews.author: HighPockets

customer_reviews.title: Cute shirt
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Sized up and still fit after it was washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: NO COMPLAINTS. It was as described. Sizing was on point! My son loved the shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift for my brother and he really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my brother and he really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Monette Escaname

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is so cute! However, my grandson lost it before July 4th, never having worn it 😕
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Smith

customer_reviews.title: It was barely noticeable and my 10 year old son loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Image was duplicated, but only slightly. It was barely noticeable and my 10 year old son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ALRelf

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bought for my 4yr old and it fit perfect design is nice overall happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shirt was great
customer_reviews.text: For fourth of july parade for son. It looked small for the size ordered, but once on it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get better than that
customer_reviews.text: Dabbing Uncle Sam?? Doesn’t get better than that! My 8 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Adubs414

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what I bought it for
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what I bought it for. The graphic is not blended into the t-shirt and will fade after a few months of wash
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: A little small but it fits but the shirt its self is s good one
customer_reviews.author: Aailayh Gates

product_meta.title: Dabbing Uncle Sam T Shirt 4th of July Kids Boys Men Gifts
product_meta.description: Funny Dabbing Uncle Sam 4th of July T-shirt. For other shirts and styles please click through our Brand Name.
feature_bullets: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Machine wash cold with like colors, dry low heat
Dabbing Uncle Sam 4th of July Tshirt. Retro vintage tee shirt showing the trendy dab dance pose and the flag of America or USA. Funny t-shirt gift for American Independence Day.
Great US Patriotic American Pride t-shirt for men, women, kids, boys, girls, youth on national holidays, Veterans Day, Memorial Day, President's Day, and Labor Day. Perfect gift idea for Birthday.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
